entries.title: Ukraine war: What does facial recognition software make of Putin’s backdrop crowd?
entries.description: There's been speculation public meetings with President Putin have been staged.

entries.title: US bank Silvergate hit with $8bn in crypto withdrawals
entries.description: The bank has had to sell $5.2bn in assets to cover two-thirds of its customers withdrawing their deposits.

entries.title: Schools hit by cyber attack and documents leaked
entries.description: Confidential details including child passport scans and SEN data is published online, the BBC finds.

entries.title: Samsung sees profit plunge by 69% as chip prices slump
entries.description: The slump comes as the global economic slowdown hits memory chip prices and demand for devices.

entries.title: Flying boats and other tech for cleaner shipping
entries.description: The shipping industry is experimenting with foils, sails and fuel to make itself less carbon intensive.
